examples.example: 我用信用卡合理消费，让生活更加便捷和舒适。

translate.english: I use credit cards for reasonable consumption to make life more convenient and comfortable.

examples.example: 我使用信用卡购买了心仪已久的书籍，丰富了自己的知识储备。

translate.english: I used a credit card to buy the long-awaited books and enriched my knowledge reserve.

examples.example: 我巧用信用卡的优惠活动，享受了许多超值的消费体验。

translate.english: I skillfully used the preferential activities of the credit card and enjoyed many valuable consumption experiences.
